Textarea

Default State
Textarea description 
<div class="sui-form-field">

	<label
		for="unique-id"
		id="label-unique-id"
		class="sui-label"
	>
		Label
	</label>

	<textarea
		id="unique-id"
		class="sui-form-control"
		aria-labelledby="label-unique-id"
		aria-describedby="description-unique-id"
	></textarea>

	<span id="description-unique-id" class="sui-description">Description</span>

</div>
Error State Some textarea fields need to show an error state styles, for those cases you only have to add sui-form-field-error class to sui-form-field.
There is an error on this field. Textarea error description. 
<div class="sui-form-field sui-form-field-error">

	<label
		for="unique-id"
		id="label-unique-id"
		class="sui-label"
	>
		Label
	</label>

	<textarea
		id="unique-id"
		class="sui-form-control"
		aria-labelledby="label-unique-id"
		aria-describedby="error-unique-id description-unique-id"
	></textarea>

	<span id="error-unique-id" class="sui-error-message">Error message</span>

	<span id="description-unique-id" class="sui-description">Description</span>

</div>
